module.name: Parking Pro
module.description: PARK PRO - COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php - Provides Multiple Parking Lots, per extension assignment for default lots, Park and Page Announce and other advanced parking features to come
module.changelog: *12.0.5* FREEPBX-8371 - Remove beta tag *12.0.4* Fixes to licensing *12.0.3* Fixes to ParkAndAnnounce on Asterisk 12 and higher *12.0.2* Prioritize hook to happen after paging *12.0.1alpha8* FREEPBX-7762 Unable to set CallerID Prepend in Park and Announce related to setting invalid page group *12.0.1alpha7* Add doConfigPageInit *12.0.1alpha6* Fixes FREEPBX-7229 ability to disable courtesy beep *12.0.1alpha5* Fixes FREEPBX-7322 issue with comparing of blank strings *12.0.1alpha4* Use New Functions for getting last ID from DB *12.0.1alpha3* Fixes FREEPBX-7221 *12.0.1alpha2* Change function *12.0.1alpha1* Asterisk 12 Support *2.11.0.3* Fixes #6871, a related issue from Parking which affects this module as well. Fixes #FREEI-49 *86 Feature code not working *2.11.0.2* Add hints for each parking lot *2.11.0.0beta1.25* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.0beta1.25 *2.11.0.0beta1.24* Don't automatically include all functions *2.11.0.0beta1.23* Remove debug statement *2.11.0.0beta1.22* Fixes invalid destination notifications on the dashboard *2.11.0.0beta1.20* Add 'This feature is currently not licensed. For more information on this feature or to purchase this Add On module please see the information below.'
